name: ULTIMATE CLIMAX BALL EXTREME Arcade Edition
name_original: ULTIMATE CLIMAX BALL EXTREME Arcade Edition
description:
ULTIMATE CLIMAX BALL EXTREME Arcade Edition is a spinoff game of ULTIMATE CLIMAX BALL EXTREME.

Keep the ball from touching the ground!

Created by Team Disaster

  • Sebastian Scaini
  • Benjamin d'Abadie
  • Peter Francis
  • Heather (Snorkelhead) Cleveland
